column5: I rarely write “strategy or how to” articles but I do get a lot of emails or questions about spots on lakes We have mainly done our trips near the end of August and there are 3 spot or structure types that have become our go tos https://www.northernjacks.com/post/walleye-magnets Cheers Andrew
Another good article Andrew!  Thanks for the read!  Chrispy!
Hey.  Thanks!  Glad you enjoyed it Andrew
nice job! well written .. love tossing into those rapids thinking oh well she's gone haha
My best fall tip is switching from jigs to vertical jigging spoons.   It's been a trip saver.
Never thought of that.. we usually tip a jig with some sucker belly..
